entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who has a Gringotts vault and is willing to split the money with the Weasleys. He is also mentioned as someone who would take a picture of Ron if he goes naked.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who refuses to wear something, and his mother Mrs. Weasley is frustrated with him.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is Harry's owl that is choking on an Owl Treat.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as Ron's mother who is frustrated with him and suggests he go naked if he doesn't wear something.

relationships.description: Harry has a relationship with the Weasleys, as mentioned in the text where he is willing to split his money with them.
Ron is a child of Mrs. Weasley, as mentioned in the text where she is frustrated with him and suggests he go naked.
Harry owns Pigwidgeon, his owl that is choking on an Owl Treat.
